He continued to circle, howling in another tone, he backtracked his 
steps and repeated the low howl, with any luck it would lose him in 
the scent. With any luck it would think it was dealing with more than 
one wolf and run away, but he knew how his luck ran.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> The tiger hears the howls and smells the wolf.  It's face almost 
> showed a smile. It crouched lower and waited perfectly still, 
hidden 
> by the tall grass.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Lunarpine silently moves through the tall grass circling the 
Tiger, 
> > he stays low and lets out a Deep, low howl.
> > 
> > Lunarpine doesn't want to kill the creature unless he has to, 
this 
> > could be the ancestor of somebodys pet.
> >
